Text: Oh my god, you have no idea how long I've been looking for these. Finally, some that aren't fricking PDFs. Excellent job, dataswife.

Thank you so very much.  I have looked for these for a while now.
Is Paolini planning on writing other series?

Hey, Im trying to download these but for some reason it keeps saying - Error: Problem connecting to tracker
Can someone help please?

xoxoxo perfect upload! awesome! thank you very much!!! these books are so expensive on the kindle when they really shouldn't be. i own everything in hardcover & sometimes i feel like they should include an electronic copy when you buy a hardcover.

Always happy to help! Took me AGES to find non-PDFS of these so of course I shared them :D There are plenty of the 4th book around (wasn't released when I created this) so I don't think I'll bother uploading it... :D
